earliest years the sights of
television were before his eyes...the

ears. His impressions and knowledge
of the world about him came in signal
part from the images on the screen
and the relationships they tendered.
Learning from television is for

to its approaches and oriented to
its conventions.
For his older brother or sister...
used to television as home entertain¬
